title: crash report after champ select - bugsplat
body:
i can open league just fine and go into champ select, it loads but then a crash report that's "powered by bugsplat" pops up: https://gyazo.com/064cf1f80f820aeba192f8dd0ffdb4ac

i've tried reinstalling twice already and no change in results. i've seen similar discussion posts but none actually giving a solid explanation of what to do to fix this problem. i was hoping you guys can help me out!

replies.body:
I have the same issue. bugsplat where the loading screen should be. Look in C: Riot Games/LeagueofLegends/Logs/Game-r3d Logs, im betting the last log looks like this

Bugsplat issues occur when the game has failed to render.  The usualy culprits are either driver, hardware, or game file issues.  Your best bet is to go through the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to rule out these possibilities.  I also recommend downloading our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) which provides an automatic repair process just in case there was an issue during your repair.  Let me know if you have any questions!

So i started having recently the same problem with bugsplat , i dont know if its because of lolreplay (unninstaled) , nvidia geforce, firewall or whatsover...
I've tried everything it says on the game crash guide, tried repairing the game, unninstaled and installed in different folders like 4 5 times now, turned off firewall, change resolutions, delete the logitech files. i cant make this work i dont what happened in the last month .
